001package com.github.aecsocket.calibre.core;
002
003import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Boundable;
004import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.raycast.Raycast;
005import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.scheduler.TaskContext;
006import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.cartesian.Vector3;
007import com.github.aecsocket.minecommons.core.vector.polar.Coord3;
008
009import java.util.concurrent.ThreadLocalRandom;
010
011public abstract class Bullet<B extends Boundable, M extends Projectile.Medium<B>> extends Projectile<B, M> {
012    private final double originalSpeed;
013
014    public Bullet(Raycast<B> raycast, Vector3 position, Vector3 velocity, double gravity, double dragCoeff, double dragArea, double mass, M medium) {
015        super(raycast, position, velocity, gravity, dragCoeff, dragArea, mass, medium);
016        originalSpeed = velocity.length();
017    }
018
019    public double originalSpeed() { return originalSpeed; }
020
021    protected abstract double deflectThreshold(B hit);
022
023    protected abstract double penetration();
024
025    protected abstract double hardness(B hit);
026
027    /*@Override
028    protected void hit(TaskContext ctx, Vector3 origin, Vector3 direction, double speed, Raycast.Result<B> ray, Raycast.Hit<B> hit) {
029        double power = speed / originalSpeed;
030        B bound = hit.hit();
031
032        double penetration = 1 - hardness(bound) / (penetration() * power);
033        if (penetration > 0) {
034            // penetrates
035            penetrate(direction, hit.out(), hit.penetration());
036            velocity = velocity.multiply(Math.min(1, penetration));
037            Coord3 coord = Coord3.coord3(speed, velocity.sphericalYaw(), velocity.sphericalPitch());
038            // TODO deflection inside a medium stuff, make it variable
039            velocity = coord
040                .yaw(coord.yaw() + ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextGaussian() * 0.05)
041                .pitch(coord.pitch() + ThreadLocalRandom.current().nextGaussian() * 0.05)
042                .cartesian();
043            ++penetrated;
044        } else {
045            // try deflect
046            Vector3 normal = hit.normal();
047            double dot = Math.abs(direction.dot(normal));
048            double deflectMult = 1 - dot / (deflectThreshold(bound) * power);
049            if (deflectMult > 0) {
050                // deflect
051                deflect(direction, normal, deflectMult);
052            } else {
053                // stuck
054                ctx.cancel();
055            }
056        }
057    }*/
058}
